title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 505.11 - Order after hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 505.11 - Order after hearing

State Regulations

In the event respondent is found guilty after a hearing, an
order specifying the disposition of the notice of violation, including any
penalty or penalties imposed and the time and manner of payment, shall be
served personally, electronically, or by first-class mail on the respondent and
its representative, if any, within 30 days subsequent to the
decision. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
505.11

Amended

New

York State Register March 5, 2025/Volume XLVII, Issue 09, eff. 3/5/2025

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
